features.title: mi-thermal-py-crypt
features.description: Modify thermal configuration files (e.g., thermal-normal.conf) used by mi-thermald on Xiaomi, Redmi, and Poco devices. This tool allows you to decrypt configurations for editing and re-encrypt them for device compatibility, as mi-thermald only accepts encrypted files.

features.title: Anticheat UI Website Design (Figma)
features.description: A hyper-detailed web-based interface focused on anticheat monitoring and policy enforcement ,designed for admins and security teams to oversee device integrity. The design emphasizes usability, security, and real-time oversight.

certs.title: Sertifikat Visualisasi Data
certs.description: Pengakuan atas kemampuan menerjemahkan data mentah menjadi visual yang bernilai strategis. Melalui pelatihan ini, saya menguasai teknik visualisasi untuk meningkatkan kejelasan informasi dan mendukung komunikasi efektif dalam proyek berbasis data.
